title: Drawing, "Design for Citibank/Citicorp Logo", ca. 1975
medium: Graphite and black marker on white tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in black marker, lower left: Citibank/CITIBANK.
description: Two Citibank logotype designs on lower-left side. Top design features thin italic sans-serif font. Lower design features bold sans-serif font in caps. Each design is beside a logo depicting a four-pointed nautical star within a horizontal oval with longitude and latitude lines.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Citibank/Citicorp Logo", ca. 1975.
ca. 1975. Graphite and black marker on white tracing paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-42.
